meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the use of low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The cryostatic chamber kept the samples at a very cold temperature for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The cryostatic equipment was essential for preserving the delicate biological samples.
meanings.sent3: The cryostatic freezer was so cold that even the ice cream shivered.
meanings.sent4: In the cryostatic environment, time seemed to freeze along with the objects.
meanings.sent5: The cryostatic conditions turned the liquid nitrogen into a solid in seconds.

meanings.definition: A system or device designed to maintain low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: The cryostatic unit in the lab was used to cool down the scientific equipment.
meanings.sent2: The cryostatic machine hummed softly as it regulated the temperature of the room.
meanings.sent3: The cryostatic cooler was so efficient that it could even chill hot beverages in seconds.
meanings.sent4: The cryostatic system worked tirelessly to keep the laboratory at the required cold level.
meanings.sent5: The cryostatic device was a lifesaver for storing perishable items in the heat of summer.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being at a low temperature.
meanings.sent1: The cryostatic of the room made it uncomfortable to stay for long periods.
meanings.sent2: The cryostatic inside the freezer preserved the food for a long time.
meanings.sent3: The cryostatic in the ice rink made the skaters feel like they were gliding on clouds.
meanings.sent4: The cryostatic of the mountain peak chilled the hikers to the bone.
meanings.sent5: The cryostatic of the winter morning painted the landscape in a frosty white coat.
